Translations.Text: Ac O my people non provoked tuus opposition me into incurring same disasters people Noah people de Hood people de Saaleh; people Lot non est too far ex vos
Vos implore tuus Dominus forgiveness tunc repent Eum. My Dominus est Merciful Generis
They dictus O Shu aib nos non comprehend multus de things vos telling nos nos vide vos est powerless among nos. Si non est tuus gens nos stoned vos. Vos non habet value nos
He dictus O my people my gens command major prenobilis than DEUS? Hoc why vos est est heedless de Eum? My Dominus est fully aware de everything vos perfecit

O my people iit on perfecit quod vos wish ac ita testimentum ego! Vos perfecit certainly invenit out quae de nos incur shameful retribution; vos perfecit invenit out qui liar est Just wait anticipation ego wait anticipation vos
When noster judgment advenit nos saved Shu aib those believed eum mercy nos. Prout pro malus unus they struck disaster ut sinister them denatus in their domus
Est prout though they nunquam existed Ergo Midyan periit just like Thamoud periit ante ut
Nos sent Moses noster signum profound authority
To Pharaoh his senior. they subsequentis command Pharaoh Pharaoh's command non est wise
